Name: Butler's Tipple
Ingredients: 10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Almost creamy with vanilla, bittersweet rootiness and cognac.
History: Created by Nicholas Gilmour at The Tippling House, Aberdeen, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Butler's Tipple contains 155 calories
